atk-abh02a3:5_0: Kamato ariyasaccesu, yaṁ ñāṇaṁ tassa kiccato;
atk-abh02a3:9_0: Tattha ‘vibhāgato’ti dukkhādīnañhi cattāro cattāro atthā vibhattā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
atk-abh02a3:9_6: ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-abh02a3:9_19: ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā”ti.
atk-abh02a3:9_25: Iti evaṁ vibhattānaṁ catunnaṁ catunnaṁ atthānaṁ vasena dukkhādīni veditabbānīti.
atk-abh02a3:10_0: ‘Nibbacanalakkhaṇādippabhedato’ti ettha pana ‘nibbacanato’ tāva idha ‘du’iti ayaṁ saddo kucchite dissati;
atk-abh02a3:10_6: Tasmā kucchitattā tucchattā ca dukkhanti vuccati.
atk-abh02a3:10_7: ‘Saṁ’iti ca ayaṁ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṁyogaṁ dīpeti;
atk-abh02a3:10_11: Iti dukkhassa saṁyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccati.
atk-abh02a3:11_0: Tatiyasaccaṁ pana yasmā ‘ni’saddo abhāvaṁ ‘rodha’saddo ca cārakaṁ dīpeti,
atk-abh02a3:11_1: tasmā abhāvo ettha saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā,
atk-abh02a3:11_2: samadhigate vā tasmiṁ saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti vuccati,
atk-abh02a3:11_4: Catutthasaccaṁ pana yasmā etaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhībhūtattā,
atk-abh02a3:12_16: Atha vā etesaṁ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a3:12_19: catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho ‘ariyo’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-abh02a3:12_20: Apica kho pana ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni;
atk-abh02a3:12_21: ariyānīti tathāni avitathāni avisaṁvādakānīti attho. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a3:13_14: Tathā saṅkhatataṇhāasaṅkhatadassanalakkhaṇāni cāti evamettha ‘lakkhaṇādippabhedato’ vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:14_0: ‘Atthatthuddhārato cevā’ti ettha pana atthato tāva ko saccaṭṭhoti ce?
atk-abh02a3:14_3: titthiyānaṁ attāva anupalabbhasabhāvo ca na hoti;
atk-abh02a3:14_4: atha kho bādhanapabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva;
atk-abh02a3:14_6: lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a3:15_0: Nābādhakaṁ yato dukkhaṁ, dukkhā aññaṁ na bādhakaṁ;
atk-abh02a3:17_0: Taṁ vinā nāññato dukkhaṁ, na hoti na ca taṁ tato;
atk-abh02a3:19_0: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṁ na ca na taṁ yato;
atk-abh02a3:21_0: Maggā aññaṁ na niyyānaṁ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
atk-abh02a3:26_8: “Ekañhi saccaṁ na dutiyamatthī”tiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca.
atk-abh02a3:26_10: Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha ‘atthuddhārato’pi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:27_4: na hi etehi aññaṁ adhikaṁ vā etesaṁ vā ekampi apanetabbaṁ sambhoti. Yathāha – “idha,
atk-abh02a3:27_6: āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:27_7: aññaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yaṁ samaṇena gotamena desitaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:27_8: Ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi.
atk-abh02a3:27_12: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:27_14: Ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paccakkhāya aññaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi.
atk-abh02a3:29_1: Ettha ca oḷārikattā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:29_5: Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṁ vā sattānaṁ saṁvegajananatthaṁ paṭhamaṁ dukkhamāha.
atk-abh02a3:29_8: ito pana hotīti ñāpanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ samudayaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:29_9: Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṁviggamānasānaṁ dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṁ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṁ nirodhaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:29_10: Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṁ nirodhasampāpakaṁ magganti evamettha ‘kamato’ vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:30_0: ‘Ariyasaccesu yaṁ ñāṇaṁ tassa kiccato’ti saccañāṇakiccatopi vinicchayo veditabboti attho.
atk-abh02a3:30_3: Tattha anubodhañāṇaṁ lokiyaṁ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati.
atk-abh02a3:30_4: Paṭivedhañāṇaṁ lokuttaraṁ nirodhārammaṇaṁ katvā kiccato cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo,
atk-abh02a3:30_10: tattha dukkhañāṇaṁ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavanavasena pavattamānaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ nivatteti,
atk-abh02a3:30_14: dukkhañāṇaṁ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvarahitesu khandhesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasaññāsaṅkhātaṁ phale vippaṭipattiṁ,
atk-abh02a3:30_15: samudayañāṇaṁ issarappadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṁ hetumhi vippaṭipattiṁ,
atk-abh02a3:30_17: maggañāṇaṁ kāmasukhallikaattakilamathānuyogappabhede avisuddhimagge visuddhimaggaggāhavasena pavattaṁ upāye vippaṭipattiṁ nivatteti.
atk-abh02a3:31_0: Loke lokappabhave, lokatthagame sive ca tadupāye;
atk-abh02a3:32_0: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānīti.
atk-abh02a3:34_10: sabbesaṁyeva vā etesaṁ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṁ ariyakantasīlattā sīlassa ca saddhāhatthena paṭiggahetabbattā
atk-abh02a3:36_5: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha”nti vacanato saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:36_7: Itaraṁ pana ariyasaccadvayaṁ siyā dukkhaṁ aniccato,
atk-abh02a3:36_8: na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati tathatthena.
atk-abh02a3:36_9: Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṁ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca aññatra taṇhāya.
atk-abh02a3:36_10: Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṁ bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati tathatthena neva dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:36_11: Evaṁ samudayādīsupi yathāyogaṁ yojetvā ‘catukkato’pettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:37_0: ‘Suññatekavidhādīhī’ti ettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a3:38_0: Dukkhameva hi na koci dukkhito, kārako na kiriyāva vijjati;
atk-abh02a3:39_0: Atthi nibbuti na nibbuto pumā, maggamatthi gamako na vijjatīti.
atk-abh02a3:43_2: Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye dukkhassābhāvato magge ca nirodhassa,
atk-abh02a3:43_3: na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṁ pakati viya.
atk-abh02a3:43_5: na hetusamavetaṁ hetuphalaṁ hetuphalasamavāyavādīnaṁ dviaṇukādīni viya.
atk-abh02a3:44_0: Tayamidha nirodhasuññaṁ, tayena tenāpi nibbuti suññā;
atk-abh02a3:45_0: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṁ hetunā suññanti.
atk-abh02a3:47_20: Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṁ viya rajjena nippadesehi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito. Yathāha –
atk-abh02a3:48_2: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā.
atk-abh02a3:49_2: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṁ sīlakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato,
atk-abh02a3:49_4: Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a3:49_5: vīriye pana paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ sādhentiyā laddhūpakāro hutvā sakkoti.
atk-abh02a3:50_1: yathā hi nakkhattaṁ kīḷissāmāti uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu eko supupphitaṁ campakarukkhaṁ disvā hatthaṁ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-abh02a3:50_3: So tassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-abh02a3:50_5: So ekassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā ekassa aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṁ kīḷeyya.
atk-abh02a3:51_0: Ekato uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā,
atk-abh02a3:51_2: hatthaṁ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṁ asakkonto viya attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ asakkonto samādhi,
atk-abh02a3:51_5: Yathā tesu ekassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā ekassa aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṁ gahetuṁ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a3:51_6: evameva vīriye paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ sādhentiyā laddhūpakāro samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ.
atk-abh02a3:52_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya ‘aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ anattā’ti ārammaṇaṁ nicchetuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a3:52_1: vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṁ?
atk-abh02a3:52_2: Yathā hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṁ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva parivattetuṁ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a3:52_3: aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṁ sakkoti;
atk-abh02a3:52_4: evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṁ nicchetuṁ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a3:52_5: abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāya ādāya dinnameva nicchetuṁ sakkoti.
atk-abh02a3:52_6: Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā,
atk-abh02a3:52_8: Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṁ gacchati.
atk-abh02a3:53_0: Apica sabbāneva saccāni ekavidhāni avitathattā abhiññeyyattā vā,
atk-abh02a3:53_2: tividhāni dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbato appahātabbato nevapahātabbanāpahātabbato ca,
atk-abh02a3:54_0: ‘Sabhāgavisabhāgato’ti sabbāneva ca saccāni aññamaññaṁ sabhāgāni avitathato attasuññato dukkarapaṭivedhato ca. Yathāha –

atk-abh02a3:55_2: yo dūratova sukhumena tālacchiggaḷena asanaṁ atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ avirādhitaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:55_3: yo vā sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyā”ti? “Etadeva, bhante,

atk-abh02a3:55_7: duppaṭivijjhataraṁ paṭivijjhanti ye idaṁ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṁ paṭivijjhanti…pe…

atk-abh02a3:63_0: Tattha dukkhassa ariyasaccassa kathanatthāya ayaṁ mātikā –
atk-abh02a3:64_0: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhavedanā sabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā ‘dukkhadukkhaṁ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a3:64_2: Upekkhāvedanā ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayapīḷitattā ‘saṅkhāradukkhaṁ’ nāma.

atk-abh02a3:64_5: Kaṇṇasūladantasūlarāgajapariḷāhadosajapariḷāhādi kāyikacetasiko ābādho pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato ‘paṭicchannadukkhaṁ’ nāma,

atk-abh02a3:65_0: Tattha pariyāyadukkhaṁ nippariyāyadukkhanti imasmiṁ padadvaye ṭhatvā dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ kathetabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:65_1: Ariyasaccañca nāmetaṁ pāḷiyaṁ saṅkhepatopi āgacchati vitthāratopi.
atk-abh02a3:65_2: Saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepenapi vitthārenapi kathetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a3:65_3: Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne pana vitthāreneva kathetuṁ vaṭṭati,

atk-abh02a3:65_6: Tasmā yaṁ taṁ niddesavāre “tattha katamaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ?
atk-abh02a3:65_10: Yā tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjātī”ti imassa pana padabhājanīyassa vasena veditabbāni.

atk-abh02a3:66_10: Tamhi tamhīti ayaṁ jātigativasena anekesaṁ sattanikāyānaṁ sādhāraṇaniddeso.
atk-abh02a3:67_5: “Tiriyā nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṁ āhacca ṭhitā ahosī”ti ettha paññattiyaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:67_29: Te hi pākaṭā eva hutvā nibbattanti.

atk-abh02a3:68_6: Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra uppajjamānāyatanavasena saṅgaho veditabbo.

atk-abh02a3:68_9: Ayaṁ vuccati jātīti ayaṁ jāti nāma kathiyati.

atk-abh02a3:69_3: Yaṁ taṁ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṁ āpāyikaṁdukkhaṁ,

atk-abh02a3:69_7: ayañhi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno na uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīsu nibbattati.
atk-abh02a3:69_8: Atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa udarapaṭalapiṭṭhikaṇḍakānaṁ vemajjhe paramasambādhe tibbandhakāre
atk-abh02a3:69_11: So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṁ viya paccamāno piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno
atk-abh02a3:70_0: Yaṁ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanauṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato eḷako viya
atk-abh02a3:70_1: ahiguṇṭhikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhunananiddhunanādinā upakkamena adhimattaṁ

atk-abh02a3:71_2: Yaṁ vijāyamānāya mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṁ viya atibhayānakaṁ yonimaggaṁ paṭipātiyamānassa
atk-abh02a3:71_3: paramasambādhena yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa mahānāgassa narakasattassa viya
atk-abh02a3:71_9: Yaṁ tato paraṁ pavattiyaṁ attanāva attānaṁ vadhantassa,
atk-abh02a3:72_0: Yaṁ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa dukkhaṁ uppajjati –

atk-abh02a3:87_0: Na taṁ bhave tattha na cassa jāti,
atk-abh02a3:93_0: Kiṁ bhāsitena bahunā nanu yaṁ kuhiñci,
atk-abh02a3:98_4: Ayañhi jarāti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā,
atk-abh02a3:98_10: Valittacatāti iminā maṁsaṁ milāpetvā tace valittabhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā.
atk-abh02a3:98_11: Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccanti ādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā.
atk-abh02a3:98_12: Tehi imesaṁ vikārānaṁ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtāti pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-abh02a3:98_13: Yatheva hi udakassa vā vātassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṁ saṁsaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-abh02a3:98_14: na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni,
atk-abh02a3:98_15: evameva jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo,
atk-abh02a3:99_0: Āyunosaṁhāni indriyānaṁ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaṅkhātāya pakatiyā dīpitā.
atk-abh02a3:99_2: Tattha yasmā jaraṁ pattassa āyu hāyati tasmā jarā “āyuno saṁhānī”ti phalūpacārena vuttā.
atk-abh02a3:99_3: Yasmā daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṁ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni
atk-abh02a3:99_4: jaraṁ pattassa paripakkāni āluḷitāni avisadāni oḷārikampi attano visayaṁ gahetuṁ asamatthāni honti,
atk-abh02a3:100_0: Sā panesā evaṁ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-abh02a3:100_1: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍādibhāvadassanato rūpadhammesu jarā ‘pākaṭajarā’ nāma.
atk-abh02a3:100_2: Arūpadhammesu pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato ‘paṭicchannajarā’ nāma.
atk-abh02a3:100_5: Taṁ cakkhunā disvā manodvārena cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṁ jānāti,
atk-abh02a3:100_6: udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni gosiṅgādīni oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvaṁ jānanaṁ viya.
atk-abh02a3:100_7: Puna avīci savīcīti evampi ayaṁ jarā duvidhā hoti.
atk-abh02a3:100_8: Tattha maṇikanakarajatapavāḷacandasūriyādīnaṁ mandadasakādīsu pāṇīnaṁ viya ca pupphaphalapallavādīsu
atk-abh02a3:100_9: apāṇīnaṁ viya ca antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṁ dubbiññeyyattā jarā ‘avīcijarā’ nāma,
atk-abh02a3:100_11: Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṁ suviññeyyattā jarā ‘savīcijarā’ nāma.
atk-abh02a3:101_3: Tesu pana patitesu puna dantā uṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh02a3:101_6: Kesā pana paṭhamameva tambāpi honti kāḷakāpi setāpi.
atk-abh02a3:101_15: Ayaṁ vuccati jarāti ayaṁ jarā nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a3:102_0: ‘Jarāya dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṁ na dukkhā,
atk-abh02a3:102_4: Jiṇṇassa hi attabhāvo jarasakaṭaṁ viya dubbalo hoti,
atk-abh02a3:102_5: ṭhātuṁ vā gantuṁ vā nisīdituṁ vā vāyamantassa balavaṁ kāyadukkhaṁ uppajjati;
atk-abh02a3:102_7: Iti imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena dukkhāti veditabbā. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:107_0: Pappoti dukkhaṁ yaṁ macco, kāyikaṁ mānasaṁ tathā;
atk-abh02a3:108_0: Sabbametaṁ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhāti.
atk-abh02a3:110_4: Antaradhānanti ghaṭassa viya bhinnassa bhinnānaṁ cutikhandhānaṁ yena kenaci pariyāyena ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:111_3: Khandhesu pana bhijjamānesu satto marati bhinnesu matoti vohāro hoti.
atk-abh02a3:111_13: Ettha ca kaḷevarassa nikkhepakaraṇato maraṇaṁ “kaḷevarassa nikkhepo”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:112_0: Jīvitindriyassa upacchedoti iminā indriyabaddhasseva maraṇaṁ nāma hoti,
atk-abh02a3:112_4: Atthato pana evarūpāni vacanāni sassādīnaṁ khayavayabhāvameva dīpenti.
atk-abh02a3:112_5: Idaṁ vuccati maraṇanti idaṁ sabbampi maraṇaṁ nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a3:114_0: ‘Maraṇassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana idampi sayaṁ na dukkhaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:114_6: Iti imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena dukkhanti veditabbaṁ. Api ca –
atk-abh02a3:122_0: Apica imāni jātijarāmaraṇāni nāma imesaṁ sattānaṁ vadhakapaccāmittā viya otāraṁ gavesantāni vicaranti.
atk-abh02a3:122_1: Yathā hi purisassa tīsu paccāmittesu otārāpekkhesu vicarantesu eko vadeyya –
atk-abh02a3:122_2: “ahaṁ asukaaraññassa nāma vaṇṇaṁ kathetvā etaṁ ādāya tattha gamissāmi,
atk-abh02a3:122_4: Dutiyo vadeyya “ahaṁ tava etaṁ gahetvā gatakāle pothetvā dubbalaṁ karissāmi,
atk-abh02a3:122_7: “tayā etasmiṁ pothetvā dubbale kate tiṇhena asinā sīsacchedanaṁ nāma mayhaṁ bhāro hotū”ti.
atk-abh02a3:123_0: Tattha paṭhamapaccāmittassa araññassa vaṇṇaṁ kathetvā taṁ ādāya tattha gatakālo viya suhajjañātimaṇḍalato
atk-abh02a3:123_1: nikkaḍḍhitvā yattha katthaci nibbattāpanaṁ nāma jātiyā kiccaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:123_2: Dutiyassa pothetvā dubbalakaraṇaṁ viya nibbattakkhandhesu nipatitvā parādhīnamañcaparāyaṇabhāvakaraṇaṁ jarāya kiccaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:123_3: Tatiyassa tiṇhena asinā sīsacchedanaṁ viya jīvitakkhayapāpanaṁ maraṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:124_1: Jarādukkhaṁ tattha annapānarahitassa dubbalyaṁ viya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:124_2: Maraṇadukkhaṁ dubbalassa iriyāpathapavattane vihataparakkamassa vāḷādīhi anayabyasanāpādanaṁ viya daṭṭhabbanti.
atk-abh02a3:126_4: Tena ñātibyasanena phuṭṭhassāti ajjhotthaṭassa abhibhūtassa samannāgatassāti attho.
atk-abh02a3:126_10: rogo hi ārogyaṁ byasati vināsetīti byasanaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:126_13: Sammādiṭṭhiṁ vināsayamānā uppannā diṭṭhiyeva byasanaṁ diṭṭhibyasanaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:126_16: Purimāni ca tīṇi neva kusalāni na akusalāni.
atk-abh02a3:127_0: Aññataraññatarenāti gahitesu vā yena kenaci aggahitesu vā mittāmaccabyasanādīsu yena kenaci.
atk-abh02a3:127_2: Aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammenāti yena kenaci sokadukkhassa uppattihetunā.
atk-abh02a3:127_9: So hi abbhantare sukkhāpento viya parisukkhāpento viya uppajjatīti “antosoko antoparisoko”ti vuccati.
atk-abh02a3:128_1: Soko hi uppajjamāno aggi viya cittaṁ jhāpeti paridahati,
atk-abh02a3:128_7: Ayaṁ vuccati sokoti ayaṁ soko nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a3:128_8: So panāyaṁ kiñcāpi atthato domanassavedanāva hoti,
atk-abh02a3:129_0: ‘Sokassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayaṁ sabhāvadukkhattā ceva dukkhassa ca vatthubhāvena dukkhoti vutto.
atk-abh02a3:129_3: Sokavegena hi hadaye mahāgaṇḍo uṭṭhahitvā paripaccitvā bhijjati,
atk-abh02a3:129_7: ettakā me bhogā”ti cintentassa ca balavaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:129_8: Iti imesaṁ dvinnaṁ dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvenapesa dukkhoti veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:130_0: Sattānaṁ hadayaṁ soko, sallaṁ viya vitujjati;
atk-abh02a3:133_0: Dukkhampi vividhaṁ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a3:135_1: mayhaṁ putto’ti evaṁ ādissa ādissa devanti rodanti etenāti ādevo.
atk-abh02a3:135_2: Taṁ taṁ vaṇṇaṁ parikittetvā parikittetvā devanti etenāti paridevo.
atk-abh02a3:135_3: Tato parāni dve dve padāni purimadvayasseva ākārabhāvaniddesavasena vuttāni.
atk-abh02a3:135_10: Ayaṁ vuccati paridevoti ayaṁ paridevo nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a3:136_0: ‘Paridevassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṁ na dukkho,
atk-abh02a3:136_2: Paridevanto hi attano khandhaṁ muṭṭhīhi potheti,
atk-abh02a3:136_6: ‘Ettakā me ñātayo khayaṁ vayaṁ abbhatthaṁ gatā’tiādīni cinteti.
atk-abh02a3:136_8: Iti imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena dukkhoti veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:143_1: domanassassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ubhayampetaṁ sayañca dukkhattā kāyikacetasikadukkhānañca vatthubhāvena dukkhanti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:143_4: vaṇamukhehi puḷuvakesu nikkhamantesu balavaṁ kāyadukkhaṁ uppajjati;
atk-abh02a3:143_5: nānāraṅgarattavatthamanuññālaṅkāraṁ nakkhattaṁ kīḷantaṁ mahājanaṁ disvā balavadomanassaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:143_6: Evaṁ tāva dukkhassa dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvo veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:144_0: Pīḷeti kāyikamidaṁ, dukkhaṁ dukkhañca mānasaṁ bhiyyo;
atk-abh02a3:145_0: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vuttanti.
atk-abh02a3:146_0: Cetodukkhasamappitā pana kese pakiriya urāni patipisenti,
atk-abh02a3:146_8: Taṁ taṁ viparītaṁ vatthuṁ tathā tathā vippaṭisārino pariḍayhamānacittā cintenti.
atk-abh02a3:146_9: Evaṁ domanassassa ubhinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvo veditabbo. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:147_0: Pīḷeti yato cittaṁ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṁ samāvahati;
atk-abh02a3:150_5: Ayaṁ vuccati upāyāsoti ayaṁ upāyāso nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a3:151_0: ‘Upāyāsassa dukkhaṭṭho veditabbo’ti ettha pana ayampi sayaṁ na dukkho,
atk-abh02a3:151_2: Kupitena hi raññā issariyaṁ acchinditvā hataputtabhātikānaṁ āṇattavadhānaṁ bhayena aṭaviṁ pavisitvā nilīnānaṁ
atk-abh02a3:151_3: mahāvisādappattānaṁ dukkhaṭṭhānena dukkhaseyyāya dukkhanisajjāya balavaṁ kāyadukkhaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:151_5: ettakā bhogā naṭṭhā’ti cintentānaṁ balavadomanassaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:151_6: Iti imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena dukkhoti veditabboti. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:152_0: Cittassa paridahanā, kāyassa visādanā ca adhimattaṁ;
atk-abh02a3:153_0: Yaṁ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto.
atk-abh02a3:154_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājaneyeva telādīnaṁ pāko viya soko.
atk-abh02a3:154_1: Tikkhagginā paccamānassa bhājanato bahinikkhamanaṁ viya paridevo.
atk-abh02a3:154_2: Bahinikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamitumpi appahontassa antobhājaneyeva yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a3:156_12: Catūhi yogehi khemaṁ nibbhayaṁ vivaṭṭaṁ na icchanti,
atk-abh02a3:156_13: sabhayaṁ vaṭṭameva nesaṁ kāmenti icchantīti āyogakkhemakāmā.
atk-abh02a3:157_0: Apica saddhādīnaṁ vuddhisaṅkhātassa atthassa akāmanato tesaṁyeva hānisaṅkhātassa anatthassa ca kāmanato anatthakāmā.
atk-abh02a3:157_1: Saddhādīnaṁyeva upāyabhūtassa hitassa akāmanato saddhāhāniādīnaṁ upāyabhūtassa ahitassa ca kāmanato ahitakāmā.
atk-abh02a3:157_2: Phāsukavihārassa akāmanato aphāsukavihārassa ca kāmanato aphāsukakāmā.
atk-abh02a3:157_3: Yassa kassaci nibbhayassa akāmanato bhayassa ca kāmanato ayogakkhemakāmāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a3:158_5: Saṅkhāravasena pana yaṁ labbhati taṁ gahetabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:158_6: Ayaṁ vuccatīti ayaṁ appiyasampayogo nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a3:159_0: So atthato eko dhammo nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a3:159_1: Kevalaṁ appiyasampayuttānaṁ duvidhassāpi dukkhassa vatthubhāvato dukkhoti vutto.
atk-abh02a3:159_2: Aniṭṭhāni hi vatthūni samodhānagatāni vijjhanachedanaphālanādīhi kāyikampi dukkhaṁ uppādenti,
atk-abh02a3:160_0: Disvāva appiye dukkhaṁ, paṭhamaṁ hoti cetasi;
atk-abh02a3:165_1: Mātā vātiādi panettha atthakāme sarūpena dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:165_10: Ayaṁ amhākaṁ ajjhattikoti evaṁ jānanti ñāyantīti vā ñātī.
atk-abh02a3:165_13: Ayaṁ vuccatīti ayaṁ piyehi vippayogo nāma kathiyati.
atk-abh02a3:166_0: So atthato eko dhammo nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a3:166_1: Kevalaṁ piyavippayuttānaṁ duvidhassāpi dukkhassa vatthubhāvato dukkhoti vutto.
atk-abh02a3:166_2: Iṭṭhāni hi vatthūni viyujjamānāni sarīrassa sosanamilāpanādibhāvena kāyikampi dukkhaṁ uppādenti,
atk-abh02a3:168_0: Bālā yato tato yaṁ, dukkhoti mato piyaviyogoti.
atk-abh02a3:170_3: Nakho panetaṁ icchāya pattabbanti yaṁ etaṁ “aho vata mayaṁ na jātidhammā assāma,
atk-abh02a3:170_4: na ca vata no jāti āgaccheyyā”ti evaṁ pahīnasamudayesu sādhūsu vijjamānaṁ ajātidhammattaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:170_5: parinibbutesu ca vijjamānaṁ jātiyā anāgamanaṁ icchitaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:170_6: taṁ icchantassāpi maggabhāvanāya vinā apattabbato anicchantassa ca bhāvanāya pattabbato na icchāya pattabbaṁ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a3:170_9: Yampicchanti yenapi dhammena alabbhaneyyaṁ vatthuṁ icchanto na labhati,
atk-abh02a3:170_12: Evamettha alabbhaneyyavatthūsu icchāva “yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkha”nti vuttā.
atk-abh02a3:171_0: Dvinnaṁ pana dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvato dukkhāti vuttā.
atk-abh02a3:171_1: Ekacco hi rājā bhavissatīti sambhāvito hoti.
atk-abh02a3:171_2: So chinnabhinnagaṇena parivārito pabbatavisamaṁ vā vanagahanaṁ vā pavisati.
atk-abh02a3:171_3: Atha rājā taṁ pavattiṁ ñatvā balakāyaṁ peseti.
atk-abh02a3:171_4: So rājapurisehi nihataparivāro sayampi laddhappahāro palāyamāno rukkhantaraṁ vā pāsāṇantaraṁ vā pavisati.
atk-abh02a3:171_7: Atha naṁ samantato kāḷakipillikādayo pāṇā parivāretvā gaṇhanti.
atk-abh02a3:171_9: ‘Maṁ ekaṁ nissāya ettakā ñātī ca bhogā ca vinaṭṭhā’ti cintentassa balavadomanassaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:171_10: Iti ayaṁ icchā imesaṁ dvinnampi dukkhānaṁ vatthubhāvena dukkhāti veditabbā. Apica –
atk-abh02a3:172_0: Taṁ taṁ patthayamānānaṁ, tassa tassa alābhato;
atk-abh02a3:173_0: Yaṁ vighātamayaṁ dukkhaṁ, sattānaṁ idha jāyati.
atk-abh02a3:177_1: Dukkhañhi ettakāni dukkhasatānīti vā ettakāni dukkhasahassānīti vā ettakāni dukkhasatasahassānīti vā saṁkhipituṁ na sakkā,
atk-abh02a3:177_4: saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti desanaṁ saṅkhipento evamāha.
atk-abh02a3:179_0: Jātippabhutikaṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ vuttaṁ idha tādinā;
atk-abh02a3:180_0: Avuttaṁ yañca taṁ sabbaṁ, vinā ete na vijjati.
atk-abh02a3:183_15: Tena bādhiyamānānaṁ puthujjanānaṁ tattha paṭighuppattito cetobādhanadukkhaṁ domanassaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:183_17: Manorathavighātappattānaṁ icchāvighātadukkhaṁ icchitālābhoti evaṁ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva
atk-abh02a3:183_18: dukkhāti yadetaṁ ekamekaṁ dassetvā vuccamānaṁ anekehi kappehi na sakkā asesato vattuṁ,
atk-abh02a3:183_19: taṁ sabbampi dukkhaṁ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṁ viya yesu kesuci pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
atk-abh02a3:183_20: saṅkhipitvā dassetuṁ “saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti bhagavā avocāti.
atk-abh02a3:186_6: Sā panesā punabbhavassa dāyikāpi atthi adāyikāpi,
atk-abh02a3:186_11: dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkamattāpi ponobbhavikā evāti nāmaṁ labhati.
atk-abh02a3:186_13: nandirāgena saddhiṁ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a3:186_22: bhavapatthanāvasena uppannassa sassatadiṭṭhisahagatassa rūpārūpabhavarāgassa ca jhānanikantiyā cetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:187_0: Idāni tassā taṇhāya vatthuṁ vitthārato dassetuṁ sā kho panesātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a3:187_3: Yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpanti yaṁ lokasmiṁ piyasabhāvañceva madhurasabhāvañca.
atk-abh02a3:187_4: Cakkhuṁ loketiādīsu lokasmiñhi cakkhādīsu mamattena abhiniviṭṭhā sattā sampattiyaṁ patiṭṭhitā attano
atk-abh02a3:187_5: cakkhuṁ ādāsādīsu nimittaggahaṇānusārena vippasannapañcapasādaṁ suvaṇṇavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇisīhapañjaraṁ
atk-abh02a3:187_7: sotaṁ rajatapanāḷikaṁ viya pāmaṅgasuttakaṁ viya ca maññanti,
atk-abh02a3:187_8: tuṅganāsāti laddhavohāraṁ ghānaṁ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaharitālavaṭṭiṁ viya maññanti,
atk-abh02a3:187_10: kāyaṁ sālalaṭṭhiṁ viya suvaṇṇatoraṇaṁ viya ca maññanti,
atk-abh02a3:187_11: manaṁ aññesaṁ manena asadisaṁ uḷāraṁ maññanti,
atk-abh02a3:187_14: attanā paṭiladdhāni catusamuṭṭhānikagandhārammaṇādīni ‘kassa aññassa evarūpāni atthī’ti maññanti.
atk-abh02a3:187_15: Tesaṁ evaṁ maññamānānaṁ tāni cakkhādīni piyarūpāni ceva honti sātarūpāni ca.
atk-abh02a3:187_16: Atha nesaṁ tattha anuppannā ceva taṇhā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a3:187_21: Tattha uppajjamānāti yadā uppajjati tadā ettha uppajjatīti attho.
atk-abh02a3:190_0: 204.Nirodhasaccaniddese yo tassāyeva taṇhāyāti ettha ‘yo tasseva dukkhassā’ti vattabbe yasmā samudayanirodheneva dukkhaṁ nirujjhati no aññathā, yathāha –
atk-abh02a3:195_0: Tasmā taṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ dassento samudayanirodhena dassetuṁ evamāha.
atk-abh02a3:195_2: Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca dassentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti, na phale.
atk-abh02a3:195_4: Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca dassentā attakilamathānuyogena ceva tasseva ca desanāya phale paṭipajjanti,
atk-abh02a3:195_6: Sīhasamānavuttitāya satthā hetumhi paṭipajjanto yo tassāyevātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a3:196_0: Tattha tassāyevāti yā sā uppatti nivesavasena heṭṭhā pakāsitā tassāyeva.
atk-abh02a3:196_2: Nibbānañhi āgamma taṇhā asesā virajjati nirujjhati.
atk-abh02a3:196_7: Tasmā nibbānaṁ “cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo”ti vuccati.
atk-abh02a3:196_9: Nāmāni panassa sabbasaṅkhatānaṁ nāmapaṭipakkhavasena anekāni nibbānavevacanāneva honti,
atk-abh02a3:196_22: anupapatti, agati, ajātaṁ, ajaraṁ, abyādhi, amataṁ, asokaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:197_0: Idāni maggena chinnāya nibbānaṁ āgamma appavattipattāyapi ca taṇhāya yesu vatthūsu tassā uppatti dassitā,
atk-abh02a3:197_1: tattheva abhāvaṁ dassetuṁ sā kho panesātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a3:197_2: Tattha yathā puriso khette jātaṁ tittaalābuvalliṁ disvā aggato paṭṭhāya mūlaṁ pariyesitvā chindeyya,
atk-abh02a3:197_4: Tato tasmiṁ khette tittaalābu niruddhā pahīnāti vucceyya.
atk-abh02a3:197_5: Evameva khette tittaalābu viya cakkhādīsu taṇhā.
atk-abh02a3:197_6: Sā ariyamaggena mūlacchinnā nibbānaṁ āgamma appavattiṁ gacchati.
atk-abh02a3:197_7: Evaṁ gatā pana tesu vatthūsu khette tittaalābu viya na paññāyati.
atk-abh02a3:197_8: Yathā ca aṭavito core ānetvā nagarassa dakkhiṇadvāre ghāteyyuṁ,
atk-abh02a3:197_9: tato aṭaviyaṁ corā matāti vā māritāti vā vucceyyuṁ;
atk-abh02a3:197_10: evameva aṭaviyaṁ corā viya yā cakkhādīsu taṇhā,
atk-abh02a3:197_11: sā dakkhiṇadvāre corā viya nibbānaṁ āgamma niruddhattā nibbāne niruddhā.
atk-abh02a3:197_12: Evaṁ niruddhā pana tesu vatthūsu aṭaviyaṁ corā viya na paññāyati.
atk-abh02a3:197_13: Tenassā tattheva nirodhaṁ dassento “cakkhuṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:200_1: Ariyoti taṁtaṁmaggavajjhehi kilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo.
atk-abh02a3:202_0: Tesu ca ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kiccāni honti,
atk-abh02a3:202_2: sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṁ micchādiṭṭhiṁ pajahati,
atk-abh02a3:203_0: Apicesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā hoti,
atk-abh02a3:203_2: kiccato pana dukkhe ñāṇantiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a3:203_5: Tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a3:203_6: Sammāvācādayo tayo pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā viratiyopi honti cetanāyopi,
atk-abh02a3:203_8: Sammāvāyāmo sammāsatīti idampi dvayaṁ kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a3:204_0: Iti imesu aṭṭhasu dhammesu bhagavatā nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārattā paṭhamaṁ sammādiṭṭhi desitā.
atk-abh02a3:204_2: Tasmā etāya pubbabhāge vipassanāñāṇasaṅkhātāya sammādiṭṭhiyā avijjandhakāraṁ viddhaṁsetvā kilesacore ghātento khemena yogāvacaro nibbānaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a3:204_3: Tena vuttaṁ “nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārattā paṭhamaṁ sammādiṭṭhi desitā”ti.
atk-abh02a3:205_2: Yathā hi heraññiko hatthena parivattetvā parivattetvā cakkhunā kahāpaṇaṁ olokento ‘ayaṁ kūṭo,
atk-abh02a3:205_4: evaṁ yogāvacaropi pubbabhāge vitakkena vitakketvā vipassanāpaññāya olokayamāno ‘ime dhammā kāmāvacarā,
atk-abh02a3:205_6: Yathā vā pana purisena koṭiyaṁ gahetvā parivattetvā parivattetvā dinnaṁ mahārukkhaṁ tacchako vāsiyā tacchetvā kamme upaneti,
atk-abh02a3:205_7: evaṁ vitakkena vitakketvā vitakkatvā dinnadhamme yogāvacaro paññāya ‘ime dhammā kāmāvacarā,
atk-abh02a3:205_8: ime dhammā rūpāvacarā’tiādinā nayena paricchinditvā kamme upaneti.
atk-abh02a3:207_0: Yasmā pana ‘idañcidañca karissāmā’ti paṭhamaṁ vācāya saṁvidahitvā loke kammante payojenti,
atk-abh02a3:207_1: tasmā vācā kāyakammassa upakārikāti sammāvācāya anantaraṁ sammākammanto vutto.
atk-abh02a3:208_1: tividhaṁ kāyaduccaritaṁ pahāya ubhayaṁ sucaritaṁ pūrentasseva yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṁ pūrati,
atk-abh02a3:209_0: Evaṁ suddhājīvena ‘parisuddho me ājīvo’ti ettāvatā paritosaṁ akatvā suttappamattena viharituṁ na yuttaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:209_1: atha kho sabbairiyāpathesu idaṁ vīriyamārabhitabbanti dassetuṁ tadanantaraṁ sammāvāyāmo vutto.
atk-abh02a3:210_0: Tato āraddhavīriyenāpi kāyādīsu catūsu vatthūsu sati suppatiṭṭhitā kātabbāti dassanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ sammāsati desitā.
atk-abh02a3:211_0: Yasmā pana evaṁ suppatiṭṭhitā sati samādhissa upakārānupakārānaṁ dhammānaṁ gatiyo samanvesitvā pahoti ekattārammaṇe cittaṁ samādhātuṁ,
atk-abh02a3:212_6: taṇhā samudayo”ti evaṁ saṅkhepena ca “katame pañcakkhandhā?
atk-abh02a3:212_7: Rūpakkhandho”tiādinā nayena vitthārena ca ācariyassa santike uggaṇhitvā vācāya punappunaṁ parivattento yogāvacaro kammaṁ karoti;
atk-abh02a3:212_8: itaresu pana dvīsu saccesu “nirodhasaccaṁ iṭṭhaṁ kantaṁ manāpaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:212_9: maggasaccaṁ iṭṭhaṁ kantaṁ manāpa”nti evaṁ savaneneva kammaṁ karoti.
atk-abh02a3:212_10: So evaṁ kammaṁ karonto cattāri saccāni ekena paṭivedhena paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh02a3:213_9: Imassa ca bhikkhuno pubbe pariggahato ‘dukkhaṁ parijānāmi,
atk-abh02a3:214_7: Itaresaṁ pana dvinnaṁ dassanatthāya payogo bhavaggagahaṇatthaṁ hatthappasāraṇaṁ viya,
atk-abh02a3:214_9: satadhā bhinnavālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭipādanaṁ viya ca hoti.
atk-abh02a3:214_11: Evaṁ duddasattā gambhīresu gambhīrattā ca duddasesu catūsu saccesu uggahādivasena pubbabhāgañāṇuppattiṁ sandhāya idaṁ “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:215_3: Tattha nekkhammavitakko kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṁ padacchedaṁ karonto uppajjati,
atk-abh02a3:215_6: Nekkhammavitakko ca kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a3:216_0: Tattha yogāvacaro kāmavitakkassa padaghātanatthaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ vā sammasati aññaṁ vā pana kiñci saṅkhāraṁ.
atk-abh02a3:216_1: Athassa vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāsampayutto saṅkappo tadaṅgavasena kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṁ padacchedaṁ karonto uppajjati,
atk-abh02a3:216_3: Athassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayutto saṅkappo samucchedavasena kāmavitakkassa padaghātaṁ padacchedaṁ karonto uppajjati;
atk-abh02a3:216_4: byāpādavitakkassāpi padaghātanatthaṁ byāpādavitakkaṁ vā aññaṁ vā saṅkhāraṁ sammasati;
atk-abh02a3:216_5: vihiṁsāvitakkassa padaghātanatthaṁ vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ vā aññaṁ vā saṅkhāraṁ sammasati.
atk-abh02a3:217_0: Kāmavitakkādīnaṁ pana tiṇṇaṁ pāḷiyaṁ vibhattesu aṭṭhatiṁsārammaṇesu ekakammaṭṭhānampi apaccanīkaṁ nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a3:217_1: Ekantato pana kāmavitakkassa tāva asubhesu paṭhamajjhānameva paccanīkaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:217_4: Tasmā asubhe parikammaṁ katvā jhānaṁ samāpannassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānasampayutto saṅkappo vikkhambhanavasena
atk-abh02a3:217_6: Jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapentassa vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāsampayutto saṅkappo tadaṅgavasena kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:217_7: Vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā maggaṁ pāpentassa maggakkhaṇe maggasampayutto saṅkappo samucchedavasena kāmavitakkassa paccanīko hutvā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:218_1: karuṇāya parikammaṁ katvā jhānaṁ samāpajjatīti sabbaṁ purimanayeneva yojetabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:218_4: Evamete nekkhammasaṅkappādayo vipassanājhānavasena uppattīnaṁ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā;
atk-abh02a3:218_5: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannassa akusalasaṅkappassa padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-abh02a3:219_0: Sammāvācāniddesepi yasmā aññeneva cittena musāvādā viramati,
atk-abh02a3:219_3: maggakkhaṇe pana micchāvācāsaṅkhātāya catubbidhāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-abh02a3:219_4: maggaṅgaṁ pūrayamānā ekāva sammāvācāsaṅkhātā kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:220_0: Sammākammantaniddesepi yasmā aññeneva cittena pāṇātipātā viramati,
atk-abh02a3:220_4: maggakkhaṇe pana micchākammantasaṅkhātāya tividhāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-abh02a3:220_5: maggaṅgaṁ pūrayamānā ekāva sammākammantasaṅkhātā akusalaveramaṇī uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:221_5: Idhāpi yasmā aññeneva cittena kāyadvāravītikkamā viramati;
atk-abh02a3:221_8: maggakkhaṇe pana dvīsu dvāresu sattannaṁ kammapathānaṁ vasena uppannāya micchāājīvadussīlyacetanāya padacchedato
atk-abh02a3:221_9: anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṁ pūrayamānā ekāva sammāājīvasaṅkhātā kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati.
atk-abh02a3:222_2: Aññeneva hi cittena anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya vāyāmaṁ karoti,
atk-abh02a3:222_4: aññeneva ca anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya,
atk-abh02a3:222_7: Ekameva hi maggasampayuttaṁ vīriyaṁ catukiccasādhanaṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labbhati.
atk-abh02a3:223_5: Ekāyeva hi maggasampayuttā sati catukiccasādhanaṭṭhena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-abh02a3:224_8: dutiyādayopi dutiyādīnaṁ aññatarajjhānikā vā paṭhamajjhānikā vā.
atk-abh02a3:224_9: Evaṁ cattāropi maggā jhānavasena sadisā vā asadisā vā ekaccasadisā vā honti.
atk-abh02a3:225_1: Pādakajjhānaniyāmena tāva paṭhamajjhānalābhino paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppannamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti;
atk-abh02a3:225_3: Dutiyajjhānato uṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno maggo dutiyajjhāniko hoti;
atk-abh02a3:225_5: Tatiyajjhānato uṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno maggo tatiyajjhāniko hoti;
atk-abh02a3:225_8: Esa nayo catutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā.
atk-abh02a3:226_1: Tañca kho lokuttaraṁ no lokiyanti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:226_3: Etthāpi paṭhamajjhānādīsu yato uṭṭhāya sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭilabhitvā āruppasamāpattiṁ bhāvetvā yo āruppe uppanno,
atk-abh02a3:226_4: taṁjhānikāva tassa tattha tayo maggā uppajjanti.
atk-abh02a3:226_6: Keci pana therā “vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyāmentī”ti vadanti.
atk-abh02a3:226_9: Tesaṁ vādavinicchayo heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe lokuttarapadabhājanīyavaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:226_10: Ayaṁ vuccati sammāsamādhīti yā imesu catūsu jhānesu ekaggatā,
atk-abh02a3:227_0: Tattha lokiyamagge sabbāneva maggaṅgāni yathānurūpaṁ chasu ārammaṇesu aññatarārammaṇāni honti.
atk-abh02a3:227_1: Lokuttaramagge pana catusaccapaṭivedhāya pavattassa ariyassa nibbānārammaṇaṁ avijjānusayasamugghātakaṁ paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh02a3:227_2: Tathā sampannadiṭṭhissa taṁsampayuttaṁ tividhamicchāsaṅkappasamugghātakaṁ cetaso nibbānapadābhiniropanaṁ sammāsaṅkappo.
atk-abh02a3:227_3: Tathā passantassa vitakkentassa ca taṁsampayuttāva catubbidhavacīduccaritasamugghātikāya micchāvācāya virati sammāvācā.
atk-abh02a3:227_4: Tathā viramantassa taṁsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā tividhakāyaduccaritavirati sammākammanto.
atk-abh02a3:227_5: Tesaṁyeva sammāvācākammantānaṁ vodānabhūtā taṁsampayuttāva kuhanādisamucchedikā micchāājīvavirati sammāājīvo.
atk-abh02a3:227_6: Imissā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṁkhātāya sīlabhūmiyaṁ patiṭṭhamānassa tadanurūpo taṁsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako
atk-abh02a3:227_7: anuppannuppannānaṁ akusalakusalānaṁ anuppādapahānuppādaṭṭhitisādhako ca vīriyārambho sammāvāyāmo.
atk-abh02a3:227_8: Evaṁ vāyamantassa taṁsampayuttova micchāsativiniddhunanako kāyādīsu kāyānupassanādisādhako ca cetaso asammoso sammāsati.
atk-abh02a3:227_9: Iti anuttarāya satiyā suvihitacittārakkhassa taṁsampayuttāva micchāsamādhisamugghātikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhīti.
atk-abh02a3:227_10: Esa lokuttaro ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo yo saha lokiyena maggena dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti saṅkhaṁ gato.
atk-abh02a3:228_0: So kho panesa maggo sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappānaṁ vijjāya,
atk-abh02a3:228_1: sesadhammānaṁ caraṇena saṅgahitattā vijjā ceva caraṇañca.
atk-abh02a3:228_3: itaresaṁ samathayānena saṅgahitattā samatho ceva vipassanā ca.
atk-abh02a3:228_6: avasesānaṁ samādhikkhandhena adhipaññāadhisīlaadhicittasikkhāhi ca saṅgahitattā khandhattayañceva sikkhāttayañca hoti;
atk-abh02a3:228_7: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako dassanasamatthehi cakkhūhi gamanasamatthehi ca pādehi samannāgato addhiko
atk-abh02a3:228_9: samathayānena attakilamathānuyoganti antadvayaṁ parivajjetvā majjhimapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno paññākkhandhena mohakkhandhaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:228_11: samādhikkhandhena ca lobhakkhandhaṁ padālento adhipaññāsikkhāya paññāsampadaṁ,
atk-abh02a3:228_13: adhicittasikkhāya samādhisampadanti tisso sampattiyo patvā amataṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti,
atk-abh02a3:231_2: Tattha “ariyasaccānī”ti avatvā nippadesato paccayasaṅkhātaṁ samudayaṁ dassetuṁ “cattāri saccānī”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:231_3: Ariyasaccānīti hi vutte avasesā ca kilesā,
atk-abh02a3:231_6: avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā na saṅgayhanti.
atk-abh02a3:231_7: Na ca kevalaṁ taṇhāva dukkhaṁ samudāneti,
atk-abh02a3:231_8: imepi avasesā ca kilesādayo paccayā samudānentiyeva.
atk-abh02a3:231_9: Iti imepi paccayā dukkhaṁ samudānentiyevāti nippadesato paccayasaṅkhātaṁ samudayaṁ dassetuṁ “ariyasaccānī”ti avatvā “cattāri saccānī”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:232_0: Niddesavāre ca nesaṁ paṭhamaṁ dukkhaṁ aniddisitvā tasseva dukkhassa sukhaniddesatthaṁ dukkhasamudayo niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh02a3:232_1: Tasmiñhi niddiṭṭhe “avasesā ca kilesā”tiādinā nayena dukkhasaccaṁ sukhaniddesaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a3:232_2: Nirodhasaccampettha taṇhāya pahānaṁ “taṇhāya ca avasesānañca kilesānaṁ pahāna”nti evaṁ yathāvuttassa
atk-abh02a3:232_4: Maggasaccaṁ panettha paṭhamajjhānikasotāpattimaggavasena dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ vibhattassa desanānayassa mukhamattameva dassentena niddiṭṭhaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:233_0: Yasmā pana na kevalaṁ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggova paṭipadā “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho
atk-abh02a3:233_1: hotī”ti vacanato pana puggalajjhāsayavasena pañcaṅgikopi maggo paṭipadā evāti desito,
atk-abh02a3:233_2: tasmā taṁ nayaṁ dassetuṁ pañcaṅgikavāropi niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh02a3:233_3: Yasmā ca na kevalaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikapañcaṅgikamaggāva paṭipadā,
atk-abh02a3:233_5: tasmā taṁ nayaṁ dassetuṁ tatiyo sabbasaṅgāhikavāropi niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh02a3:233_6: Tattha “avasesā dhammā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya sampayuttā”ti idaṁ parihāyati.
atk-abh02a3:234_0: Tattha aṭṭhaṅgikavārassa “taṇhāya avasesānañca kilesānaṁ pahāna”ntiādīsu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu paṭhamakoṭṭhāse
atk-abh02a3:234_5: appaṇihitapaṭipadāti imesu pañcasu vāresu dvinnaṁ dvinnaṁ catukkapañcakanayānaṁ vasena dasa nayā honti.
atk-abh02a3:234_6: Evaṁ sesesupīti vīsatiyā abhinivesesu dve nayasatāni.
atk-abh02a3:234_8: Iti suddhikāni dve sādhipatī aṭṭhāti sabbampi nayasahassaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a3:234_12: evaṁ sesesupīti aṭṭhaṅgikavāre pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu vīsati nayasahassāni honti.
atk-abh02a3:234_13: Tathā pañcaṅgikavāre sabbasaṅgāhikavāre cāti sabbānipi saṭṭhinayasahassāni satthārā vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a3:234_15: Evamidaṁ tividhamahāvāraṁ pañcadasakoṭṭhāsaṁ saṭṭhinayasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṁ abhidhammabhājanīyaṁ nāma niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a3:237_1: Pañhāpucchake catunnampi saccānaṁ khandhavibhaṅge vuttanayānusāreneva kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a3:237_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana samudayasaccaṁ kāmāvacaradhamme assādentassa parittārammaṇaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a3:237_9: Maggasaccaṁ sahajātahetuvasena sabbadāpi maggahetukaṁ vīriyaṁ vā vīmaṁsaṁ vā jeṭṭhakaṁ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipati,
atk-abh02a3:237_12: tesaṁyeva maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle maggādhipati,
atk-abh02a3:238_1: Etāni hi atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha uppattikāle atītādiārammaṇāni honti.
atk-abh02a3:238_2: Samudayasaccaṁ ajjhattādibhede dhamme assādentassa ajjhattādiārammaṇaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a3:238_4: Iti imasmiṁ pañhāpucchake dve saccāni lokiyāni honti,
atk-abh02a3:238_8: Sammāsambuddhena hi tīsupi suttantabhājanīyādīsu lokiyalokuttarāneva saccāni kathitāni.
atk-abh02a3:238_9: Evamayaṁ saccavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
